group_1.textRight: ...*Sigh*.

group_1.textLeft: Ms. Hiroe...

group_1.textRight: First the Diviners and the Tokime Clan, now this...my suspension of disbelief was already stretched pretty thin.

group_1.textLeft: ...I understand how you feel.
It's hard for me to imagine that the whole village lies inside a Labyrinth...
Sorry for dumping this on you so suddenly...

group_1.textRight: Don't apologize, Chiharu. We're just a little surprised.
I told you, I'd already prepared myself for whatever would happen when you became a Diviner.
I can bend my own common sense enough to accept this.

group_1.textLeft: Really, I'm sure it was far harder for you Diviners to hear this...

group_1.textRight: However, we still have no idea about how much of it was true...
It's clear to us that I was almost killed by Mikoshiba,
that Mikoshiba threatened Sunao into becoming an assassin,
and that Underlings are suddenly emerging from nowhere in the village...

group_1.textLeft: And the part about...how we Diviners become @Devils...?

group_1.textRight: Mikoshiba might have been lying in order to kill me @in a more horrible way...
That possibility's still open, so I'm not taking it as fact just yet.

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong, Shizuka...?

group_1.textRight: ...A little while ago, I had a thought that scared me.
If, hypothetically, the village really is a Devil's @Labyrinth,
then all the scenery and people I've seen might be no more than illusions, too...

group_1.textLeft: My mom came with me from outside, so I can guarantee that she's real!
And Shizuka's mother was attacked by @Underlings, too,
so she can't be fake either!

group_1.textRight: Charu...

group_1.textLeft: Who do you think gave birth to you, anyway?

group_1.textRight: That's...

group_1.textLeft: Try not to overthink it all like that. Let's just focus on the here and now.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, sorry.

group_1.textLeft: At any rate, we're 100% sure that there's a @Devil here.
Let's beat the stuffing out of it and find Granny!
We can't interrogate her without finding her, @after all.

group_1.textRight: Though if the Devil's been manipulating her, @she might not have any memory of it.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, that's...

group_1.textRight: ...I think the three of you should hurry things up.

group_1.textLeft: It's evening already...!
If we don't defeat it before the sunset, it'll be just @like that night last time!

group_1.textRight: Right. When darkness falls, the Devil will have free reign...

group_1.textLeft: What's gonna happen to our moms if we leave, though?! Will they be okay?!

group_1.textRight: Don't worry. I can take out a few Underlings myself.

group_1.textLeft: Even though your sword broke?!

group_1.textRight: So I want you to do me a quick favor before leaving.

group_1.textLeft: What...?
[chara:102600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
A ton of swords... In the wardrobe...

group_1.textRight: Can you infuse these swords with your Diviner @powers?
I see.

group_1.textLeft: See what?

group_1.textRight: A Diviner can apply her power to various objects.
[flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]And if you infuse your power into weapons @like these,
they become weapons that can be used to @fight Devils.

group_1.textLeft: Ama—zing!

group_1.textRight: So, sorry to ask this of you, but come over and infuse these before you go.
Us old folks may have technique, but not your power.

group_1.textLeft: Gotcha! We'll top these things right off!

group_1.textRight: Sunao, you come help too!

group_1.textLeft: O—okay!

group_1.textRight: The only question left is where to find the Devil...

group_1.textLeft: Um, there's still one sword left over.

group_1.textRight: That's our ace in the hole, so could you leave that one alone?
They say that the Tokime Diviners have each been adding their power to it for generations.

group_1.textLeft: That's something precious indeed. Understood.
About that sword though, Shizuka.
I might have to tell you the rest of the story about it when you come back.

group_1.textRight: Aw. What's with that half-finished feeling...?

group_1.textLeft: Just keep it in mind.

group_1.textRight: ...Okay, I understand.
